nodes.excerpt: Learn vim without enduring boring text only tutorials. vim.so gets you the muscle repetition needed to master vim quickly using interactive exercises. Vim adds code editing super powers to your editor of choice. Learn vim fast today!
nodes.title: vim.so - Learn vim fast with interactive exercises in the browser
nodes.author: Kenneth Cassel 🐍

localize.description: vim.so让你通过互动练习快速掌握vim所需的肌肉重复练习。Vim 为您选择的编辑器增加了代码编辑的超级能力。今天就来快速学习vim吧！Vim.so让你通过互动练习快速掌握vim所需的肌肉重复练习。
localize.tagline: 通过浏览器中的互动练习快速学习vim。

localize.tagline: 通過瀏覽器中的互動練習快速學習vim。

nodes.excerpt: Audiblogs lets you listen to any web article in your podcast player in an Audible-like voice. Use it to "read" while you exercise, cook, do house chores, etc.

nodes.excerpt: Say hello to Paperform V3! We’ve just released a bunch of new features that make Paperform easier to use than ever before. Features include **Guided Mode**, Slash Commands, Background videos and more.

localize.tagline: 最好的表格建立者只是变得更好。

nodes.excerpt: 👋 Clubhouse has very unique image shape and we decided to make a tool for creating colorful borders. This is a weekend project which we made together with @muratcorlu 🚀 It is open source don't worry about your privacy!
nodes.title: Chpic - Create a colorful ring for your profile picture on Clubhouse
nodes.author: Farid Movsumov

localize.description: 👋 会所有非常独特的图像形状，我们决定做一个工具来创建多彩的边框。这是我们和 @muratcorlu 🚀一起做的一个周末项目，它是开源的，不用担心你的隐私。
localize.tagline: 在Clubhouse上为你的个人档案图片设计一个彩色的戒指。

localize.description: 👋 會所有非常獨特的圖像形狀，我們決定做一個工具來創建多彩的邊框。這是我們和 @muratcorlu 🚀一起做的一個週末項目，它是開源的，不用擔心你的隱私。
localize.tagline: 在Clubhouse上爲你的個人檔案圖片設計一個彩色的戒指。

nodes.excerpt: Everything a senior needs in a single place. 70% of seniors are now online, but most of them still struggle to use the internet to its full potential. Urizen allows seniors to keep up with the pace and stay on top of their game.
nodes.title: Urizen - A simpler Google for seniors
nodes.author: Nicolas Venard

localize.description: 老年人所需的一切都在一个地方。现在70%的老年人都在上网，但他们中的大多数人仍然难以充分发挥互联网的潜力。Urizen可以让老年人跟上步伐，保持在游戏的顶端。
localize.tagline: 为老年人提供更简单的谷歌

localize.description: 老年人所需的一切都在一個地方。現在70%的老年人都在上網，但他們中的大多數人仍然難以充分發揮互聯網的潛力。Urizen可以讓老年人跟上步伐，保持在遊戲的頂端。
localize.tagline: 爲老年人提供更簡單的谷歌

nodes.excerpt: Flinkit! provides remote teams with fun and creative cooperation opportunities to enhance teamwork and trust. Teams can compete at the same time as they follow the carefully designed storyline solving highly visual tasks and riddles.
nodes.title: Online teambuilding by Flinkit! - Web-hosted team building games for small and large companies

localize.description: Flinkit！为远程团队提供趣味性和创造性的合作机会，增强团队合作和信任。团队可以在竞争的同时，按照精心设计的故事情节解决高度可视化的任务和谜语。
localize.tagline: 适用于小型和大型公司的网络托管团队建设游戏。

localize.description: Flinkit！爲遠程團隊提供趣味性和創造性的合作機會，增強團隊合作和信任。團隊可以在競爭的同時，按照精心設計的故事情節解決高度可視化的任務和謎語。
localize.tagline: 適用於小型和大型公司的網絡託管團隊建設遊戲。

nodes.excerpt: CS.code.in is a hardcore, intensive, and absolutely immersive computer engineering track with all the right ingredients of your BS+MS college programs, minus the years and hundreds of thousands of dollars.
nodes.title: The CS Code Program - Become a Computer Science Engineer in 12 months.
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: CS.code.in是一个硬核的，密集的，绝对沉浸式的计算机工程轨道，具有BS+MS大学课程的所有正确成分，减去年限和数十万美元。
localize.tagline: 在12个月内成为一名计算机科学工程师。

nodes.excerpt: Headlime’s Artificial Intelligence helps you write your articles, no matter what language they need to be in. Write with confidence knowing that every word is guaranteed to sound great and grammar-error-free.

nodes.excerpt: Remove objects from a video in less than 2 min using AI. ✂️ Remove dynamic objects, peoples, watermarks ✨ Add filters, turn your video into photos, GIF, audios 👋 Publish it in one click to seven platforms 🔎 Smart library to store your clips ✅ Try it for free
nodes.title: Evanesco - Free AI-Powered Dynamic Object Remover for Creators

localize.description: 使用人工智能在2分钟内从视频中删除对象。✂️删除动态对象、人物、水印 ✨添加滤镜，将你的视频变成照片、GIF、音频 👋一键发布到七大平台 🔎智能库存储你的剪辑 ✅免费试一下吧
localize.tagline: 为创造者提供免费的人工智能动态对象清除器。

nodes.excerpt: Powered by tens of thousands of popular fully responsive visuals, SYQEL VJ is a simple to use desktop application that enables users to instantly visualize their mic or desktop audio feeds & easily use it as a window source in OBS or other broadcasting apps.

nodes.excerpt: Generate a PDF from a URL. Simple, quick and easy. The idea behind this is simple. Don't spend your development time building complicated PDF infrastructure. Let us handle your PDF generation with a simple, asynchronous API.
nodes.title: PlutoPDF - A URL to PDF converter wrapped behind a simple API.
nodes.author: Scott Walker

localize.description: 从一个URL生成一个PDF。简单、快捷、方便。这背后的想法很简单。不要把您的开发时间花在构建复杂的PDF基础架构上。让我们用一个简单的、异步的API来处理您的PDF生成。
localize.tagline: 一个包裹在一个简单的API后面的URL到PDF转换器。

localize.description: 從一個URL生成一個PDF。簡單、快捷、方便。這背後的想法很簡單。不要把您的開發時間花在構建複雜的PDF基礎架構上。讓我們用一個簡單的、異步的API來處理您的PDF生成。
localize.tagline: 一個包裹在一個簡單的API後面的URL到PDF轉換器。

nodes.excerpt: Everyone speaks the same language - visual 🌅. So make your backend - visual! Draw your backend architecture, code right in the browser, and execute - all on the same whiteboard. Forget about logs or having to guess what your code does. SEE it in real time 😍
nodes.title: STATEWIZE - Visual software development ecosystem. Draw + Code + Execute
nodes.author: Lev Perlman

localize.description: 大家都在说同一种语言--可视化🌅。所以，让你的后台--可视化! 在浏览器中画出你的后端架构和代码，并在同一白板上执行。忘记日志或猜测你的代码做什么。实时查看😍
localize.tagline: 可视化软件开发生态系统。绘制+代码+执行

localize.description: 大家都在說同一種語言--可視化🌅。所以，讓你的後臺--可視化! 在瀏覽器中畫出你的後端架構和代碼，並在同一白板上執行。忘記日誌或猜測你的代碼做什麼。實時查看😍
localize.tagline: 可視化軟件開發生態系統。繪製+代碼+執行

nodes.excerpt: Recursive is a puzzle game about recursion, patterns, and programming. It is the perfect game for people who love hard puzzles. Your goal is to help little robots collect all gems by finding the correct pattern and translating it into a short program.
nodes.title: Recursive! - A puzzle game about recursion, patterns, and programming.
nodes.author: Saber Chaabani

localize.description: 递归是一款关于递归、模式和编程的益智游戏。这是一个完美的游戏，喜欢困难的谜题的人。你的目标是帮助小机器人收集所有的宝石，找到正确的模式，并将其转化为一个简短的程序。
localize.tagline: 一个关于递归、模式和编程的益智游戏。

localize.description: 遞歸是一款關於遞歸、模式和編程的益智遊戲。這是一個完美的遊戲，喜歡困難的謎題的人。你的目標是幫助小機器人收集所有的寶石，找到正確的模式，並將其轉化爲一個簡短的程序。
localize.tagline: 一個關於遞歸、模式和編程的益智遊戲。

nodes.excerpt: Still is designed to help you relieve symptoms of Anxiety and OCD. Using targeted messages to help pull your focus out of your anxiety or OCD as well as breathing exercises, Still helps you avoid the worst of your condition and stop it from taking hold.
nodes.title: Still - An app to help relieve symptoms of anxiety & OCD
nodes.author: Tom Norton

localize.description: Still旨在帮助你缓解焦虑和强迫症的症状。利用有针对性的信息帮助您将注意力从焦虑或强迫症中拉出来，以及呼吸练习，Still帮助您避免最糟糕的状况，并阻止它的发生。
localize.tagline: 一款帮助缓解焦虑和强迫症症状的应用程序。

localize.description: Still旨在幫助你緩解焦慮和強迫症的症狀。利用有針對性的信息幫助您將注意力從焦慮或強迫症中拉出來，以及呼吸練習，Still幫助您避免最糟糕的狀況，並阻止它的發生。
localize.tagline: 一款幫助緩解焦慮和強迫症症狀的應用程序。

nodes.excerpt: Heart Reports V2 can generate separate blood sugar, blood pressure, blood oxygen, heart rate, activity and sleep reports. All perfectly designed for printing, so you can easily show your Apple Health data to your doctor. Now with Widgets and Shortcuts support.
nodes.title: Heart Reports v2 - Export beautiful PDF health reports from the iOS Health app
nodes.author: Viszt Péter

localize.description: Heart Reports V2可以单独生成血糖、血压、血氧、心率、活动和睡眠报告。所有报告都经过完美设计，可供打印，因此你可以轻松地向医生展示你的 Apple 健康数据。现在支持Widgets和快捷键。
localize.tagline: 从iOS健康应用中导出精美的PDF健康报告。

localize.description: Heart Reports V2可以單獨生成血糖、血壓、血氧、心率、活動和睡眠報告。所有報告都經過完美設計，可供打印，因此你可以輕鬆地向醫生展示你的 Apple 健康數據。現在支持Widgets和快捷鍵。
localize.tagline: 從iOS健康應用中導出精美的PDF健康報告。
